thread.title: Talvar

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Talvar
text:
Credits
Director: Directed by Meghna Gulzar
Producer: Vineet Jain, Vishal Bhardwaj
Cast: Irrfan Khan, Konkona Sen Sharma, Tabu, Sohum Shah, Neeraj Kabi
Synopsis:
The story of the film revolves around the sensational murder of 14-year-old Aarushi Talwar and 45-year-old Hemraj Banjade, a domestic help in Noida on the night of May 15-16, 2008.
Release Date: October 2, 2015
WATCH: 'Talvar' Official Trailer | Irrfan Khan, Konkona Sen Sharma, Neeraj Kabi, Sohum Shah, Atul Kumar
